law.catch_line: This title does not apply to:...
law.text:
This title does not apply to:
an inmate retained in the custody of Patuxent Institution for:
examination to determine if the inmate is an eligible person, as defined in § 4-101 of this article; or
confinement as an eligible person under Title 4 of this article; or
a juvenile committed to the jurisdiction of the Department of Juvenile Services or an institution or facility under its jurisdiction.
